p: Increased greenhouse gas emissions and the rise in global temperature is damaging global climate, biodiversity, and ecosystems [ 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]. It is evident that climate change is also adversely affecting the global food supply chain [ 6, 7, 8], global public health, and global advancement as a whole [ 1]. Taking everything into account, greenhouse gas emissions and the rise in global temperature does directly affect the atmosphere, the biosphere, the lithosphere, and the hydrosphere [ 2, 3, 4]. Hence, it was necessary for the global community to come together and act together to deal with the challenge posed by climate change.
